case.state: Startin' with yer hooha out, huh? Well y'all're pretty ballsy.

howdy, y'all. The name's Sandy. Sandy Cheeks.

I really don't got one. I don't need ta' be rich or famous. I got friends that're more like family, my scientific research, an' my karate. What more could a squirrel ask for?
Hobbies? I gotta say my karate qualifies.
Ya' can't live in Texas an' not know how ta' grill er make chili.

Aw, hell yeah! I wouldn't trade Spongebob, Patrick, Karen, Mrs. Puff, Pearl, or even Squidward fer the world.
